title: Extreme Energy Drink - Citrus Blast - 16 oz Can
description: Monster Energy's Extreme Energy Drink in Citrus Blast flavor is packed with a potent mix of caffeine, taurine, and B-vitamins to deliver a powerful energy boost. Each 16-ounce can is designed to enhance mental alertness and physical performance, making it perfect for athletes, students, or anyone needing an extra push. The Citrus Blast flavor offers a zesty, refreshing taste while providing essential electrolytes for hydration. Experience the extreme energy you need to power through your day with this invigorating drink.
